name: Red Square Creative
tagline: Creative Communications for Brands and Business
description:
Red Square Creative is a client focused graphic design company based in Southend-on-Sea, Essex. Delivering a wide range of creative services, graphic design, printing and new media solutions to a very diverse client base. Red Square provides the abilities of a larger design agency, with all the benefits of a more intimate and cost effective service.
Our aim is to develop the right creative communications at a faction of large design agencies costs, to give our clients the competitive edge.
